definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 如果你还担心，测试下水质，或者买个纯净水过滤器。

sentences.english: Egypt's clean water had been sullied with blood by the hand of the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 那时，上帝伸手让埃及的干净水变成血。

sentences.english: First pure water using domestic cleaning process, to ensure the quality of organic products.
sentences.chinese: 采用国内首创纯净水清洗工艺，确保产品的有机品质。

sentences.english: Proper hydration is vital to good health and to have that, you need to drink pure water.
sentences.chinese: 适当的水合作用对身体好是重要的，您需要喝纯净水。

sentences.english: Star Paladin Cross, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
sentences.chinese: 星骑士克萝丝，我需要你进入那个房间打开净水装置。

sentences.english: In contrast, the home-water treatment industry is very heavily regulated.
sentences.chinese: 相对而言，制造家用净水器的行业有著严格规范。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a strong magnetizing water purifier capable of purifying and removing dirt.
sentences.chinese: 一种能净化除污的强磁化净水器。

sentences.english: Do you know how long it took me to find you that water purifier ?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我花了多长时间帮你买到净水器吗？

sentences.english: B:Take it easy.I take two bottles of puritied water.
sentences.chinese: 别着急，我带了两瓶纯净水。

sentences.english: You need at least eight glasses of pure water a day, and more than that won’t hurt you.
sentences.chinese: 您需要每天至少喝八杯纯净水，这是有益无害处的。

sentences.english: PEM Electrolysers decompose pure water into hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 质子交换膜电解分解成氢气和氧气的纯净水。

sentences.english: Her piece, titled " Back to Mother Nature, " depicts an elaborate water- cleaning machine.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品《回归大自然》描绘了一台复杂的净水机器。

sentences.english: We did not have electricity or clean water after the storm.
sentences.chinese: 我们在暴风雨以后没有电和干净水。

sentences.english: Most customers are nonprofits and governments.
sentences.chinese: 这套净水系统的大部分客户是非盈利组织和各国政府。

sentences.english: Charon, I need you to go into that chamber and turn on the purifier.
sentences.chinese: 卡戎，我需要你进入那个房间打开净水装置。

sentences.english: As with all homeopathic formulas, alcohol and purified water are used.
sentences.chinese: 在所有顺势疗法的药物中，都使用到了纯净水和酒精。

definition: Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
